author: Kim Bhasin
title: Furloughs Surpass 1 Million With T.J. Maxx Adding to Retail Toll
description: Employee furloughs in the retail industry are now well over 1 million after the owner of T.J. Maxx and Marshalls, one of America’s biggest clothing store chains, suspended its store workers.
content:
Photographer: David Paul Morris/Bloomberg
